channel.title: Software Engineering on Applied Computing
channel.description: Recent content in Software Engineering on Applied Computing

item.title: AI-Based Image Captioning
item.description: Build an application that uses image recognition and NLP to automatically generate captions for images.

item.title: COVID-19 Tracker
item.description: Create a web application that tracks and displays COVID-19 statistics globally or for a specific region.

item.title: Location-Based Recommendations
item.description: Develop a web application that provides users with coffee shop recommendations based on their location.

item.title: Library Management System
item.description: Create a simple library management system to keep track of books, borrowers, and due dates.
